channel.title: Need help, auto ipmute, a autobot
channel.description:
Hello, on my 24/7 vps, a person is autobotting and spam with: http://untameable.net/ Join us now 24/7 VPS pvpvesta JOIN!!! The help i need is: i gotta ban hi's ip, but i cant, he's ip is shifting C-61-67-169-248.bur.connect.net.au:3788 C-61-67-169-248.bur.connect.net.au:3789 C-61-67-169-248.bur.connect.net.au:3787 C-61-67-169-248.bur.connect.net.au:3786
and just getting new wholetime, help me ban him or ipmute please help!
He's name is Tom, and i talked with him in untameablescape.info and he issen't stopping.

item.title: Need help, auto ipmute, a autobot
item.dc:creator: @3lou_55 3lou 55
item.description:
@3lou_55 wrote:

Many Tuts Stopping All Syis and bots
-=-=-=-=-=
-Dont Give Out Your Ip And Port use client with hidden ip
-Make It Max Connections = = 1
-Try Using Search Button Anti Syi

Read full topic
item.source: Need help, auto ipmute, a autobot
